title: Canopies may be permitted in front open space, provided the marginal open space does not become less than 6
clause_text: Canopies may be permitted in front open space, provided the marginal open space does not become less than 6.00 mt. The size of each hall shall not be less than 4,000 sq. m. Minimum width of the hall shall not be less than 50m.
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: Canopies may be permitted in front open space, provided the marginal open space does not become less than 6.00 mt.
